Class GraphPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • GraphPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    public class GraphPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    This function used to draw dot graph on GUI. It takes data points from simulation world and updated every second by View class. Put dot for every value and gives information about some change of simulation statistics.
    Author:
    Furkan KalabalÄ±k
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • GraphPanel

        public GraphPanel​(int width,
                  int height,
                  int maxValue,
                  java.lang.String graphName,
                  java.awt.Color color)
        Constructor for graph panel. It takes height, width, max value, name and color parameter from simulation view.
        Parameters:
        width - Width of graph panel
        height - Height of graph panel
        maxValue - Maximum value that is presented on graph
        graphName - name of graph
        color - color of graph dots.

      • updateMaxValue

        public void updateMaxValue​(int updateAmount)
        If population increase, rescale must change, so update max value.
        Parameters:
        updateAmount - update amount in max value

      • paintComponent

        protected void paintComponent​(java.awt.Graphics g)
        This process paints panel by data point, using 3,3 oval shapes. Represent every x value as timer for 1 second. Values draw on scaled are by using max value
        Overrides:
        paintComponent in class javax.swing.JComponent
